review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Full integration review: traced war-room entry → pipeline.onMessage → detectStage → advanceStage → handleAutoNotifications → triggers.sendDirectMessage. No circular dependencies (setPipelineHook injection pattern). Cross-file contracts verified (sendDirectMessage 3-arg signature matches). Re-entrant notification path identified — safe now (Pipeline messages filtered by SYSTEM_LABELS), re-entrancy guard added. Forward-only stage transitions, atomic persistence, 50 tests. 91 suites / 2857 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
